This function allocates the necessary memory to reference the lines of a file in memory.

Returns:
FILE_LINES_T pointer with the base lines structure

char *  path_name,
int  number_of_files,
int  number_of_algorithms 
)

Initializes a statistical control controller and creates the shared statistical control memory segment.

Parameters:

path_namepath name for the System V IPC key
number_of_filesto store information about in the shared memory
number_of_algorithmsto store information about in the shared memory
Returns:
integer 0 if the controller was successfully initialized, the error code otherwise
